experiences: Developed a full-stack drone classification platform leveraging telemetry features (RCS, speed, altitude, etc.), benchmarking ML models (KNN, SVM, Random Forest, XGBoost) on 800K+ readings to achieve 93% accuracy, with integrated LIME/SHAP for model explainability.
Built a scalable Flask backend to process 1000+ drone profiles daily and streamlined React.js dashboards, improving state management for 30% faster load times.
Actively contributed to GirlScript Summer of Code 2024, collaborating on real-world open-source projects.
Fixed bugs and added features across multiple repositories using JavaScript and other technologies.
